channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Dartmouth College on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DARG: Dynamic Evaluation of Large Language Models via Adaptive Reasoning Graph
item.description: DARG dynamically evaluates LLMs via adaptive reasoning graphs, revealing performance drops with increased complexity and exposing model biases.

item.title: Interpretable Image Classification with Adaptive Prototype-based Vision Transformers
item.description: ProtoViT: a novel interpretable image classification method using Vision Transformers and adaptive prototypes, achieving higher accuracy and providing clear explanations.
